channel.title: Giovanni A. Crestani
channel.description: Recent content on Giovanni A. Crestani

item.title: Teaching
item.description: During my graduate degree, I am a Graduate Teaching Assistant for an Introductory Biology class at OSU.

item.title: Research
item.description: My PhD research focuses on understanding evolutionary dynamics of adaptation of complex traits using Drosophila melanogaster as a model organism.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Giovanni Alberto Crestani.
